title: Private-Equity Firms Bet Big on Property Sale Leasebacks
sub_head: SLB Capital’s Scott Merkle provides perspective on Carlyle Group’s big move into sale leasebacks
body:
Carlyle Group Inc.’s $3.07 billion purchase of real-estate developer iStar Inc.’s net-lease business marks another high-profile entry by a large private-capital firm into the sale-leaseback market.
The deal announced Wednesday includes net leases covering 18.3 million square feet of industrial, office and entertainment properties across the U.S., while the team managing iStar’s portfolio is joining Carlyle.
